H0.text: kings and queens of england in the 1900s. Edward VII

H1.text: kings and queens of england in the 1900s. Victoria

H2.text: kings and queens of england in the 1900s. George VI

H3.text: kings and queens of england in the 1900s. George V

A4.text: He inherited the throne on his mother's death in 1901.

A5.text: He ensured that his second son and heir, George V, was better prepared to take the throne.

A6.text: Works by Edward VII are available on Project Gutenberg.

A7.text: Portraits of King Edward VII are at the National Portrait Gallery, London.
